title: Detectives Investigate Homicide in Laurel
body:
Homicide
Unit detectives are actively working to arrest the suspect(s) who fatally
shot a man in Laurel. The victim is 29-year-old Joseph Healy of Avebury Drive in Laurel.
Preliminarily, detectives do not believe this was a random crime.On
April 2, 2018, at
approximately 2:15 pm, patrol officers responded to a shopping
center in the 13000 block of Laurel Bowie Road for the report of a shooting.
Healy was discovered in a vehicle suffering from a gunshot wound. He died later
at a hospital. The preliminary investigation reveals the victim was shot on
nearby Avebury Drive. He was then driven to the shopping center to get help. Detectives
are working to identify a suspect(s) in this case. Anyone
with information is asked to call the Homicide Unit at 301-772-4925. Callers
wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477),
or go online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com,
or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google
Play to download the app onto your mobile device.)
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
